Greetings to Barbadian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Barbadian PM
   Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Owen Arthur, prime minister of Barbados, on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him success in his work for the country's prosperity and people's well-being.

articles.content:
S. Korean Delegation Here
   Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the "One Nation Welfare Foundation" of south Korea led by its Chairman Kim Hyong Sok arrived here today.
 It was met at the airport by officials of the National Reconciliation Council.
